entity.name: freeOrderProduct
entity.query: SELECT fp.id,fo.id AS free_order_id,fo.parent_id AS fo_parent_id,fo.category_id,fo.company_id,cat.path AS c_path, COALESCE(vp.name_en,p.name_en) AS product_name_en,COALESCE(vp.name_ru,p.name_ru) AS product_name_ru,COALESCE(vp.name_cn,p.name_cn) AS product_name_cn, COALESCE(vpc.id,pc.id) AS product_country_id,COALESCE(vpc.name_en,pc.name_en) AS country_name_en,COALESCE(vpc.name_ru,pc.name_ru) AS country_name_ru,COALESCE(vpc.name_cn,pc.name_cn) AS country_name_cn, pm.id AS pm_id,COALESCE(vp.product_manufacturer,pm.name_en) AS pm_name_en,COALESCE(vp.product_manufacturer,pm.name_ru) AS pm_name_ru,COALESCE(vp.product_manufacturer,pm.name_cn) AS pm_name_cn, pmod.id AS pmod_id,pmod.name_en AS pmod_name_en,pmod.name_ru AS pmod_name_ru,pmod.name_cn AS pmod_name_cn, COALESCE(vp.payment_option_id,p.payment_option_id) AS product_po_id, json_agg(pp.category_property_id) AS category_property_ids,json_agg(pp.value_en) AS property_values_en, json_agg(pp.value_ru) AS property_values_ru,json_agg(pp.value_cn) AS property_values_cn FROM free_products fp LEFT JOIN free_orders fo ON fo.id = fp.free_orders_id LEFT JOIN categories cat ON cat.id = fo.category_id LEFT JOIN virtual_products vp ON vp.id = fp.virtual_product_id LEFT JOIN countries vpc ON vpc.id = vp.country_id LEFT JOIN products p ON p.id = fp.product_id LEFT JOIN countries pc ON pc.id = p.country_id LEFT JOIN product_manufacturers pm ON pm.id = p.product_manufacturer_id LEFT JOIN product_models pmod ON pmod.id = p.product_model_id LEFT JOIN product_properties pp ON fp.product_id = pp.product_id WHERE fo.proposal_free_order_id IS NULL GROUP BY fp.id,fo.id,cat.id,vp.id,vpc.id,p.id,pc.id,pm.id,pmod.id
